summary: Virgil, an eccentric freak billionaire, spends his days being a "biological inventor." The "blood dolls," his newest creation, aid him in getting revenge on those who betrayed him.
cast: Kristopher Logan|Debra Mayer|William Paul Burns|Warren Draper|Nicholas Worth|Jodie Fisher|Phil Fondacaro|Naomi McClure|Jack Forbes|Jason Pace|J. Paradee|Venesa Talor|Yvette Lera|Persia White|Matt Corboy|Beth Fisher|Merritt Bailey|Richard Ecks|Mike McDuffie|John Handler|Michael Deak
title: Blood dolls: La venganza de los mu√±ecos
